General.Name: Watani Iron Steel Co
General.Description: Watani Iron Steel Co. provides steel products for building and construction sector in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It engages in the procurement of raw materials, manufacturing, and after-sales services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: New Industrial City, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11464
